channel.title: MapEditor/Viewer V0.2B *Videos Added*
channel.description:
Hello,
V0.2B is just added the 3D effect of the landscape
The Gray is the buildings outline in the 3D version there The other colors what are purple are textures
And the Gray and Blue ones are textures and somthink else *we got to work it out*
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2e6qUExM18s Youtube preview
http://uppit.com/FYA866 VIDEO PREVIEW ADDED
New support
[img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/6030/ss20080905214055sw5.png[/img]
Color support:
[img]http://img122.imageshack.us/img122/898/ss20080905202228ix7.png[/img]
[img]http://img361.imageshack.us/img361/2958/ss20080905193656dq3.png[/img]
Got to add the landscape colors onto it next
<3 T X, Cellky
Heres some features for ya then....
Able to move the landscape up and down... Color the landscape Add textures.. Add walls doors windows and roofs

item.title: MapEditor/Viewer V0.2B *Videos Added*
item.dc:creator: @Ian Ian
item.description:
@Ian wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:4, topic:229801”][quote author=Ian link=topic=302399.msg2426434#msg2426434 date=1220640117]

Being able to color it and being able to alter it are 2 different things.

Heres some features for ya then…

Able to move the landscape up and down…
Color the landscape
Add textures…
Add walls doors windows and roofs
[/quote]
and Save it, log in and view the modified landscape? If not its useless hes saying.[/quote]

Iam uploading a video as we speak[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2008, 03:11:53 pm[/size][hr]Updated

Read full topic
